EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Delay Your ADS-B Out Upgrade Any Longer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Time is Running Out! Schedule Your ADS-B Out Upgrade Today.
Estimates indicate that up to 25% of eligible aircraft will fail to get their FAA-mandated ADS-B upgrades by the January 1, 2020 deadline, forcing them out of Class A, B and C airspace. Honeywell Aerospace is working closely with Duncan Aviation to help customers reach ADS-B Out compliance by installing the Primus II Radio System. Duncan Aviation still has capacity at satellite locations in:
• Atlanta • Boston • Cincinnati
• Kansas City • Las Vegas • Seattle
• Scottsdale • St. Louis • St. Paul
• Teterboro • Van Nuys
Don’t delay your ADS-B out upgrade any longer and risk dealing with scheduling conflicts, paying higher prices or delayed travel plans! Contact Duncan Aviation today to request a quote and schedule your upgrade.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/the-adsb-out-upgrade-featuring-honeywell-primus-ii-upgrade-by-duncan-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=18_channelamericas_commercial]]>
